Package sailpoint.web.certification

Class CertificationItemBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.web.PageCodeBase
      • sailpoint.web.BaseBean
        • sailpoint.web.certification.CertificationItemBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.component.StateHolder, sailpoint.web.UserContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CertificationItemBean.EntitlementBean, CertificationItemBean.GenericCertifiableBean, CertificationItemBean.ProfileBean
    public class CertificationItemBean
extends sailpoint.web.BaseBean
    UI bean classes for items within certifications.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CertificationItemBean.ApplicationLoader
      A Map Loader that returns applications given an application name.
      static class  CertificationItemBean.BusinessRoleBean
      UI bean used to hold information about business role certification.
      static class  CertificationItemBean.EntitlementBean
      Base bean for entitlement items.
      static class  CertificationItemBean.ExceptionBean
      UI bean used to hold information about exceptional entitlement certification.
      static class  CertificationItemBean.GenericCertifiableBean  
      static class  CertificationItemBean.ProfileBean
      UI bean which exposed the properties of a given profile under certification.
      static class  CertificationItemBean.ViolationBean
      UI bean used to hold information about PolicyViolations.

      • CertificationItemBean

        public CertificationItemBean​(sailpoint.web.BaseBean bean,
                             CertificationItem item,
                             CertificationEntity entity,
                             java.lang.String workItem)
                      throws GeneralException
        Constructor used in code.
        Parameters:
        bean - The BaseBean creating this.
        item - The certification item for this entitlement.
        entity - The certification entity for this entitlement.
        workItem - The ID of the work item in which this entitlement is being viewed. If null, the entitlement is being viewed from the within the certification.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • saveIfChanged

        public void saveIfChanged​(java.lang.String workItemId)
                   throws GeneralException
        Save this item if it has changed. This throws an exception if this is not an Approve or Remediate, since the other decisions are saved through popups.
        Parameters:
        workItemId - The ID of the work item doing the saving.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • isAccountGroup

        public boolean isAccountGroup()
        Indicates whether or not we should display certain UI elements. Currently that is whether or not we show history and the add comment on the menu.
        Returns:
        True if this is an account group certification

      • getApplicationKey

        public java.lang.String getApplicationKey()
        Return a unique key that can identify the application on which this entitlement reside (non-exception items will just return an empty string). This will be put into the DOM as a class name so that we can search for it.
